name: S.O.R.S
description: You are a new recruit at a high tech medical facility where doctors are being fired and patients are dying. Find out what’s going on, but make sure you hit the government targets otherwise you’ll be fired. Easier said than done, when that mysterious hacker is disrupting your equipment….
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: 1.8Ghz Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL 1.5 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
